response.overview: "Multi-tude" is a video art nourished by constituent powers of will, however it finds itself in the realm of doubt about the current moment and what is the next step to take. In this work, the chemical element hydrogen, which is present in practically everything and everyone, and which is common but at the same time destructive, traces a path between the film's fields of thought, mainly as an agent of desire in the poetry of Brazilian Augusto dos Anjos. The poem "Soliloquy of a Visionary" structures the video between the review of what was the multiple, and the questioning of what can give substance to the suffix "tude".
response.title: Multi-tude
